entry.def: To modernize something such as a system or a factory means to change it by replacing old equipment or methods with new ones.

example.tran: 使精炼厂现代化的计划

example.ex: There is a pressing need to modernise our electoral system.
example.tran: 我们的选举制度迫切需要现代化。

means.word_mean: 1. making modern in appearance or behavior;

sentences.sentence: "the modernization of Nigeria will be a long process"

means.word_mean: 2. a modernized version (as of a play)

auth_sentence.content: This we can do by agricultural and industrial modernization, and by moving into the information age of the 21st century.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This we can do by agricultural and industrial modernization, and by moving into the information age of the 21st century.

auth_sentence.content: Despite modernization, the Alfama remains one of the most photogenic neighborhoods in all of Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Despite modernization, the Alfama remains one of the most photogenic neighborhoods in all of Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Despite modernization, the Alfama remains one of the most photogenic neighborhoods in all of Europe.

auth_sentence.content: Significant achievements were recorded in the area of trade facilitation under the ASYCUDA III project for customs modernization.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,由-ize+-ation组成,"……化"或"发展过程"

stems_affixes.word_buile: central中心的,中央的+ization……化→n.集中,中央集权化
industrial工业的,产业的+ization……化→n.工业化,产业化
organ器官,组织+ization……化→n.组织,团体,机构

sentences.en: International competition is a spur to modernization.
sentences.cn: 国际间的竞争是走向现代化的动力。

sentences.en: Modernization is the key to speed up our agricultural development.
sentences.cn: 现代化是加快农业发展的关键。

sentences.en: Let’s pull together for the early realization of the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 为了早日实现四个现代化,让我们齐心协力地干吧。

sentences.en: Methods of management operation should also be changed to suit the needs of modernization.
sentences.cn: 管理方法也得改变一下以适应现代化的需要。
